protocols.description: A set of strings representing HTTP protocols.

guardrails_id.description: The guardrail identifier used in the request to apply the guardrail

guardrails_version.description: The guardrail version used in the request to apply the guardrail

stop_on_error.description: Stop processing if an error occurs

timeout.description: Connection timeout with the bedrock service

guarding_mode.description: The guardrail mode to use for the request

allow_masking.description: Allow to masking the request/response instead of blocking it. Streaming will be disabled if this is enabled.

text_source.description: Select where to pick the 'text' for the Content Guard Services request.

response_buffer_size.description: The amount of bytes receiving from upstream to be buffered before sending to the guardrails service. This only applies to the response content guard.

aws_region.description: The AWS region to use for the Bedrock API

aws_access_key_id.description: The AWS access key ID to use for authentication

aws_secret_access_key.description: The AWS secret access key to use for authentication

aws_assume_role_arn.description: The target AWS IAM role ARN used to access the guardrails service

aws_role_session_name.description: The identifier of the assumed role session

aws_sts_endpoint_url.description: Override the STS endpoint URL when assuming a different role
